content:
I apologize, but I made a mistake. As a user, I wouldn't respond with a booking confirmation. Instead, I would ask a follow-up question or request more information.

Here's a revised response:

That sounds great! I'm interested in booking a single room at Remm Akihabara Hotel. Can you tell me more about the hotel's cancellation policy? Are there any penalties for cancelling or modifying my reservation?
